ISSUE.TITLE: Admin: order details page does not display custom address attributes for billing address
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: 4.80.4 Custom address attributes are only displayed for the shipping address, and not for the billing address https://github.com/nopSolutions/nopCommerce/blob/db523b94283cbc14133660c01a3ccad9705f2d35/src/Presentation/Nop.Web/Areas/Admin/Views/Order/_OrderDetails.BillingShipping.cshtml#L380-L387

COMMIT.MESSAGE: #7618 Display custom address attributes for the billing address in the order details page
